EmailTemplate.subject: Your BigCommerce Catalog Transfer: We're reviewing your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thanks for completing your Catalog Transfer Verification Checklist. We have received your feedback and our catalog transfer services team is reviewing your feedback and will contact you when we're ready for you to review the catalog transfer details again.
Please hold off on making changes to your products, options and categories until we have had addressed your feedback.
Remember, we’re here to help. If you have any additional questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to catalogtransfer@bigcommerce.com. We’re looking forward to working with you!
Thanks,
The BigCommerce Team
Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
